com.adidas.ui.util

Class UiFixUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adidas.ui.util.UiFixUtils

  • public class UiFixUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class which provides methods for identification of a need to apply custom UI fixes. Basically, decision about to apply a fix or not is being made on version of Android current application is running on together with manufacture of it.
    Since:
    1.6.3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isPhoneAffectedByLgBug()
      Checks if the current device is an LG phone with 4.1.2.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • isPhoneAffectedByLgBug

        public static boolean isPhoneAffectedByLgBug()
        Checks if the current device is an LG phone with 4.1.2. This phone cannot show a back on the actionbar.
        Returns:
        true when the device is affected.
